constituent: intercept, commoner, caverns, cave, twenty, oven-fire, barbecue, road
koohiiStory1: The commoners are revolting! We must intercept them on the road before they reach the castle!
koohiiStory2: If don´t want your secret message to be intercepted, make sure your deliveryman is dressed as a commoner while traveling on the road.
words: 遮る(さえぎる): to interrupt, to intercept, to obstruct
